Services.title: Protection of client interests in corporate conflicts

desc: Development, correction of organizational documents in order to prevent corporate conflicts
Development of a strategy for the behavior of a participant in a corporate conflict
About appealing decisions of management bodies of a commercial organization
On the invalidation of founding documents
About contesting the state registration of the company
About the appeal of agreements on the alienation of shares, shares of participation in the company
About contesting large agreements and agreements in the execution of which there is an interest
About the exclusion of a member from the company
About compensation for losses caused to the company by the actions (inaction) of the company's management bodies
Constituent documents on the possibility of corporate conflicts
Legality of actions and decisions of the management bodies of the company

result.desc: of first instance, appeal, cassation instance

receives: Information on drafting organizational documents for the purpose of preventing corporate conflicts
Information about ways to ensure his interests in case of corporate conflicts
Prepared documents for protection of the client's interests
Assistance of a representative in negotiations, in court when settling corporate conflicts

of all reorganization processes
creation/liquidation of legal entities

Creation of a system of control over payables and receivables, asset management during the period of corporate conflict
